content: this crochet pattern will help you to create an easy baby doll dress the doll dress crochet pattern is easy skill level and is designed to fit 14 baby dolls the doll dress is made in one piece and only requires sewing for a single button you can make the dress in the color block rainbow design or as a solid color you will need to know basic crochet stitches and how to increase and decrease the doll dress crochet pattern is written in usa terminology the pattern is 4 pages long and includes progress photos gauge instructions and measurements supplies you will need crochet hook 4mm sewing needle dk/light worsted yarn 121 yards scissors - 15mm button recommend skill level is beginner/easy finished sizes for 14 dolls length 6 5 waist circumference 12 arm circumference 5 a free basic version of this crochet pattern is available on https //hookfully com/
